title: Jess on Zizek and Peterson, Authority and Competence, God #1 and God #2
description:
Last time Jess and I spoke we talked about Peter Rollins and Zizek before the event. This time we go into the event after. 

Towards the end I get into a fully explanation of God #1 and God #2 in terms of Jordan Peterson and Sam Harris. Why pantheism arises when we lose God #1 in Christianity and why Moralistic, Therapeutic Deism arises when God is too much God #2 and not enough God #1. 

Jess and I in talk 2 https://youtu.be/SNfv51SVB0k
JBP/ Zizek event https://youtu.be/lsWndfzuOc4

Zizek master figure pushes you out to freedom
Jbp doesn’t talk about authority , more about competence
Steve jobs the prince of apple
Jesus story, authority yields iphones
Jordan peterson’s prayer request, heidelberg catechism
Lacanian analysis, zizek’s god atheism
You come to atheism through Christianity
The holy spirit is the commune of believers, 
Zizek talks with a jesuit priest about the book of job
Peterson and suffering

#jordanpetersonzizek #jordanpeterson #zizek

For the audio podcast mirror on Podbean http://paulvanderklay.podbean.com/

To listen to this on ITunes https://itunes.apple.com/us/podcast/paul-vanderklays-podcast/id1394314333 

If you need the RSS feed for your podcast player https://paulvanderklay.podbean.com/feed/

https://www.patreon.com/paulvanderklay

Also on Lbry: https://beta.lbry.tv/@paulvanderklay

Join the Sacramento JBP Meetup https://www.meetup.com/Sacramento-Jordan-Peterson-Meetup/

Paul's Church Content at Living Stones Channel https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCh7bdktIALZ9Nq41oVCvW-A

You can donate to Living Stones CRC to support this work here http://www.livingstonescrc.org/donate 
Donations may be tax deductible for taxpayers of the United States
